title: CycloneDX Use Case Model
$comment: OWASP CycloneDX is an Ecma International standard (ECMA-424) developed in collaboration between the OWASP Foundation and Ecma Technical Committee 54 (TC54). The standard is published under a royalty-free patent policy. This JSON schema is the reference implementation and is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.

bom-ref.title: BOM Reference
bom-ref.description: An optional identifier which can be used to reference the use case elsewhere in the BOM. Every bom-ref must be unique within the BOM.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name or title of the use case.

description.title: Description
description.description: A detailed description of the use case.

actors.title: Actors
actors.description: The stakeholders or users who interact with the system in this use case.

preconditions.title: Preconditions
preconditions.description: Conditions that must be true before the use case can be executed.

postconditions.title: Postconditions
postconditions.description: Conditions that will be true after the use case has been successfully executed.

mainFlow.title: Main Flow
mainFlow.description: The primary sequence of steps that describe the use case.

alternativeFlows.title: Alternative Flows
alternativeFlows.description: Alternative sequences of steps that may occur in the use case.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Error scenarios that may occur during the execution of the use case.

successCriteria.title: Success Criteria
successCriteria.description: Criteria that determine whether the use case has been successfully executed.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional information or comments about the use case.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Provides the ability to document properties in a name-value store. This provides flexibility to include data not officially supported in the standard.

step.title: Step
step.description: A single step in a use case flow.

number.title: Number
number.description: The sequence number of the step.

actor.title: Actor
actor.description: The actor who performs this step.

flow.title: Flow
flow.description: A sequence of steps in a use case.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition under which this alternative flow is executed.

steps.title: Steps
steps.description: The sequence of steps in the flow.

exception.title: Exception
exception.description: An error scenario in a use case.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: The condition under which this exception occurs.
